PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1998-04831998-03-240,  ,  JUS,  , 
PrecisEnactment of the SPECIAL AUTHORITY TO POSSESS REGULATIONS (FIREARMS ACT) which make provision for the manufacturing of replica firearms without a licence, the temporary possession and use of them in the show business industry, and for the occasional transport and use of prohibited or automatic firearms for testing or demonstration purposes, target shooting or in competitions.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1998-0208 Publication Date: 1998-04-15
